monsterLanguages: Languages one language known by its creator
monsterSpecials: False Appearance. While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal zurkhwood mushroom.
Mute. If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.
monsterActions: Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
